name: Calzone's Adventure
description:
In this short 3 level prototype you play as Calzone the Cat. Calzone is on his way home, but the way through the forest is treacherous and full of scary rats. To make things worse, someone has lost a shipment of fish and tuna cans in the forest, Calzone just has to eat all of it.

The levels quickly ramp up in difficulty. While the first one is more of an introduction to the various elements and abilities, the next two are more challenging.

Enjoy!

Controls:

-arrow keys to move

-space to jump, again in mid air to double jump

-down + jump (on a platform) to drop down

Note:

There are a few known bugs, especially the collision detection of crates is a bit wonky.
